column4: I just installed a fresh version of 9.10 on this HTPC i built, for watever reason embedded divx video is choppy/blurry and just screwy overall. I've installed the restricted extras and its still messed up..... Has anyone had this issue, I'm sure its a simple fix but for some reason I cant figure it out.
